titleStmt.title: A declaration of his Highnes [sic] Council in Scotland, for the government thereof for the better preventing of ill-affected persons from acting any design to the disturbance of the quiet of this nation, by an unlicensed repairing into this country, and going out of the same.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Christopher Higgins, in Harts-Close, over against the Trone-Church,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Friday the 23 day of November, 1655. Signed: Emanuel Downing, Cl. of the Councill.
Imperfect: creased and stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
